00170 class RpropPlus : virtual public ModelInterface {
00171  public:
00172 
00173 
00174 //===========================================================================
00197   void initRprop(double _delta0 = 0.01) 
00198   { 
00199     deltaw.resize(w.nelem());
00200     delta.resize (w.nelem());
00201     dedwOld.resize (w.nelem());
00202     delta  = _delta0; 
00203     deltaw = 0; 
00204     dedwOld  = 0; 
00205     delta0 = _delta0;
00206   }
00207 
00208 
00209 //===========================================================================
00239   void rprop(const Array<double> &in,
00240              const Array<double> &out,
00241              double              np   = 1.2  ,
00242              double              nm   = .5   ,
00243              double              dMax = 50   ,
00244              double              dMin = 1e-6 ) 
00245   {
00246     derror(in, out, false);
00247 
00248     for(unsigned  i = 0; i < w.nelem(); i++) {
00249       if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) > 0) {
00250         delta(i) = min(dMax, np * delta(i));
00251         deltaw(i) = delta(i) * -sgn(dedw(i));
00252         w(i) += deltaw(i);
00253         dedwOld(i) = dedw(i);
00254       } else if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) < 0) {
00255         delta(i) = max(dMin, nm * delta(i));
00256         w(i) -= deltaw(i);
00257         dedwOld(i) = 0;
00258       } else {
00259         deltaw(i) = delta(i) * -sgn(dedw(i));
00260         w(i) += deltaw(i);
00261         dedwOld(i) = dedw(i);
00262       }
00263     }
00264   }
00265 
00266 
00267 //===========================================================================
00285   void clearMemory() { delta = delta0; dedwOld = 0; deltaw = 0; };
00286 
00287 
00288  protected:
00289 
00290 
00291 //===========================================================================
00308   int    sgn(double x) 
00309   { 
00310     if (x > 0) return 1; if (x < 0) return -1; return 0; 
00311   }
00312 
00314   double min(double x, double y) { return x < y ? x : y; }
00315 
00317   double max(double x, double y) { return x > y ? x : y; }

00428   void initRprop(double _delta0 = 0.01) 
00429   { 
00430     delta.resize (w.nelem());
00431     dedwOld.resize (w.nelem());
00432     delta  = _delta0; 
00433     dedwOld  = 0; 
00434     delta0 = _delta0;

00437 
00438 //===========================================================================
00468   void rprop(const Array<double> &in,
00469              const Array<double> &out,
00470              double              np   = 1.2  ,
00471              double              nm   = .5   ,
00472              double              dMax = 50   ,
00473              double              dMin = 1e-6 )
00474   {
00475     derror(in, out,false);
00476     for(unsigned  i = 0; i < w.nelem(); i++) {
00477       if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) > 0) {
00478         delta(i) = min(dMax, np * delta(i));
00479       } else if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) < 0) {
00480         delta(i) = max(dMin, nm * delta(i));
00481       } else {
00482         ;
00483       }
00484       w(i) += delta(i) * -sgn(dedw(i));
00485       dedwOld(i) = dedw(i);
00486     }
00487   }

00658 class IRpropPlus : virtual public ModelInterface {
00659  public:
00660 
00661 //===========================================================================
00684   void initRprop(double _delta0 = 0.01) 
00685   { 
00686     deltaw.resize(w.nelem());
00687     delta.resize (w.nelem());
00688     dedwOld.resize (w.nelem());
00689     delta  = _delta0; 
00690     deltaw = 0; 
00691     dedwOld  = 0; 
00692     delta0 = _delta0;
00693 #ifndef __SOLARIS__
00694     oldE   = std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00695 #else
00696     oldE   = MAXDOUBLE;
00697 #endif
00698   }
00699 
00700 
00701 //===========================================================================
00731   double rprop(const Array<double> &in,
00732              const Array<double> &out,
00733              double              np   = 1.2  ,
00734              double              nm   = .5   ,
00735              double              dMax = 50   ,
00736              double              dMin = 1e-6 )
00737   {
00738     double newE = derror(in, out);
00739 
00740     for(unsigned  i = 0; i < w.nelem(); i++) {
00741       if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) > 0) {
00742         delta(i) = min(dMax, np * delta(i));
00743         deltaw(i) = delta(i) * -sgn(dedw(i));
00744         w(i) += deltaw(i);
00745         dedwOld(i) = dedw(i);
00746       } else if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) < 0) {
00747         delta(i) = max(dMin, nm * delta(i));
00748         //cout << "Oho!" << endl;
00749         if(oldE < newE) {
00750           //cout << "Aha! ----------------" << endl;
00751           w(i) -= deltaw(i);
00752         }
00753         dedwOld(i) = 0;
00754       } else {
00755         deltaw(i) = delta(i) * -sgn(dedw(i));
00756         w(i) += deltaw(i);
00757         dedwOld(i) = dedw(i);
00758       }
00759     }
00760     oldE = newE;
00761     return newE; 
00762   }
00763 
00764 
00765 //===========================================================================
00783   void clearMemory()
00784   {
00785           delta = delta0;
00786           dedwOld = 0;
00787           deltaw = 0;
00788 #ifndef __SOLARIS__
00789           oldE = std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00790 #else
00791           oldE = MAXDOUBLE;
00792 #endif
00793   }
00794
